#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,i,j,k,diff,totdiff,count,countsofar,max;




        int a[100000];
        cin>>n>>k;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }

        sort(a,a+n,greater<int>());

        count=0;
        countsofar=1;


        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            max=a[i];
            totdiff=0;
            count=0;

            for(j=i;j<n;j++)
            {
                diff=max-a[j];
                totdiff+=diff;
                if(totdiff>k)
                    break;
                else
                    count++;
            }
            if(count>countsofar)
            countsofar=count;
        }

        cout<<countsofar<<endl;


  return 0;
}
